actions.recommendation: BMI at 23.6 & waist-to-height ratio at 47.4 are within normal limits. Blood pressure at 137/99 is above normal. Please review and monitor this frequently. Cardiovascular & aerobic exercising can help improve your blood pressure.
-BMI at 23.6 & waist-to-height ratio at 47.4 are within normal limits. Blood pressure at 137/99 is above normal. Please review and monitor this frequently.
-Improve your V02 by doing varied exercises that increase your heart rate.
-Focus on body recomposition.This will help you lower body fat & build muscle bulk.
-Repeat kidney function test when well hydrated.
-Supplement vitamin D, aim for levels above 20ng/ml.
